pkgmetadata.longdescription: Custom Made Gauss Quadrature Nodes and Weights // Use the high- precision arithmetic provided by the R package 'Rmpfr' to compute a custom-made Gauss quadrature nodes and weights, with up to 33 nodes, using a moment-based method via moment determinants. Paul Kabaila (2022) arXiv:2211.04729.
